title: Moving Sand Art, 17.3inch Dynamic Sand Picture wall Art, Moving Sand Art Picture Wall Decor Wall Sculpture Hanging Art Home Decoration
features: 【As Wall Art 】Display it in a contemporary style home as a focal wall décor.Creates an elegant finish to your living room,wall,home,dining room,bar,office,hotel and outdoor

【Majestic Beauty】This sand picture can be rotated 360°, every time it rotates, the sand starts to move, slowly forming deserts, oceans, mountains, etc. Like a waterfall and flying sand, it is pleasing to the eye, feel particularly calm and relaxed.

【Round Glass】A world in a sand, a heaven in a flower. The round frame can better show the beauty of sand picture. The circular design makes It is different from others, not only has a modern sense, but also shows a calm and stable atmosphere different from others.

【Sand Art Decoration】Every time you turn the sand art picture, you will get a different sand liquid motion vision. Sometimes it looks like a deep ocean, sometimes it looks like towering mountains, and sometimes it looks like a mysterious starry sky，every picture makes people yearn for.

【Exquisite and Elegant Gift】This moving sand art picture is a elegant gift, placed indoors can calm the heart, suitable for gifts to relatives, colleagues, friends.Ideal for Christmas, New Year, Birthday, etc.
